name: Basuphana-2 (The Land Of Zaiden) DEMO
description:
Basuphana-2 (The Land Of Zaiden) DEMO  
-----

Descend upon planet Earthia reborn.. for a surreal journey with the help of tag-along friends to stop monstrous forces seeking to bring fourth an apocalyptic ruling.

[youtube]



[/youtube]

 
-----   
  Wake up dead as a spirit in Zero-Space-Realm with no memories of your identity as
you come across an Angel calling herself Zaiden.
She tests your power setting you upon a mysterious quest. You must take down an evil demon-king atop a very-high mountain tower reaching the heavens.  Upon descending the planet Earthia, you're left atop an ocean-side hilltop.

You walk across the land entering your first village filled with inhabitants.
  You are then followed by a strange sword-smith girl who's race is called: Sky-head upon this world.
  You discover strange things as you descend further into the land. Later on, you become involved in things that seem ridiculous by nature at first, yet, the more people forcing themselves into your party the better, while advancing the cause.   The further you go the more surreal the world gets as strangest of secrets become unveiled.

A tyrannical royal government military force calling itself the Shadow Knight Empire, is after you and your friends as take off on the run of your life with both the sword-smith girl and the sassy stole away Elf girl.
You began to realize the journey just to take down a demon-king is covered in an array of bizarre unusual conspiracies as well as some very dark beings which begin organizing attempts, to take you down.
Terrifying secrets lye behind this light-heart fantasy world disguised as a forgotten & apocalyptic history..

Everything you think you know miles-away, you're drastically wrong.   Every coming concern takes the most surreal, chilling- turns as foreboding of aspects become more urgent later on.
-Do not be fooled by this innocent fantasy world with comic- relief, as it's people seem normal at first.
But things are not as they seem. The world itself, hides a history a lot darker, a lot more mysterious than realized.

-----
This is a very early unreleased Isekai game before Isekai became more well known later on. The game began development back in 2006-2007-2012 to now 2020.
This game is that old & never before released..  
This has been long lost project still in development this day.

-----

>Demo is now up above; this project still being worked on today.*

-----

The game uses RTP characters, .. but the concept is they are all reincarnated
characters who have no memories of their past lives in other Rpg games, some with more developed personalities.
  The story-line of this game is trying something new and different and will go deeper into this multi-worlds theory later as the story progresses. It is a terrifying new experimental concept I am working on.
